snippet.title: Mechanism Trailer#1
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/645290/M_E_C_H_A_N_I_S_M/

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/Mechanism.indiegame/


Mechanism - horror-adventure game with stealth elements. Dive into the depressive steam-cyberpunk world that was infected with strange disease called Flegma.
